unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, right? My dada ji in our gaon, near Varanasi, swore by it! Says since 1970s they never used chemicals. Less yield maybe, but healthier food. Heard IIT Kanpur is also researching natural pesticides now. Good for Bharat Mata! Gotta convince Sharmaji down the street too. He's all about that 20/02/2024 bumper crop dream. 10:00 AM meeting planned for this! 15/08 onwards it's all organic for me!
normalised: Organic farming is the way to go, right? My dada ji in our gaon, near Varanasi, swore by it! Says since nineteen seventies they never used chemicals. Less yield maybe, but healthier food. Heard I I T Kanpur is also researching natural pesticides now. Good for Bharat Mata! Gotta convince Sharmaji down the street too. He's all about that twentieth february two thousand and twenty four bumper crop dream. ten A M meeting planned for this! fifteenth august onwards it's all organic for me!
